Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Allows you to search for ip names. This is helpful to track down trial account abusers.\\r\\n\\r\\nNote: Character name takes precedence over account name\\r\\nso if you search for an account with the same name as a\\r\\ncharacter,the information for the character's account will\\r\\nbe what is displayed."

"+ipsearch \\"new.rr.com\\"\\r\\n Scan for any logins from a hostname that contains \\"new.rr.com\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+ipsearch \\"aziel\\"\\r\\n Scan for any logins made by the character Aziel.\\r\\n\\r\\n+ipsearch 'kargh\\r\\n Scan for any logins made by the account Kargh."
